item.title: How we built our own heroku
item.description: At Simpl, we faced a challenge to run a polyglot microservices based platform in auto-scalable and secure manner. We did not have dedicated DevOps person. We could not go ahead with a PaaS solution for lack of customizability. So we built our own solution called cloudlift. I and Jeechu presented this at multiple meetups. Sharing the presentation here…
